description:
“Arrow” has revealed another piece of Season 4 casting. Actor Jimmy Akingbola, who’s only other U.S. role was an episode of “Sons of Liberty,” will play Baron Reiter in a series of flashbacks throughout the season. In the comics the character is a supervillain known as Baron Blitzkrieg.《绿箭侠》又透露部分第四季演员阵容。演员吉米·艾金波拉，作为“自由之子”那集中仅有的几个美国角色，将扮演巴隆·赖特在该剧闪回出现。在漫画里该角色是众人皆知的超级反派闪电战男爵。

Baron Blitzkrieg was first introduced in 1977 as an adversary to both Wonder Woman and Superman. While it’s unclear if he will be a metahuman on “Arrow,” his comic book counterpart is a former Nazi soldier who can fly and has superhuman strength and heat vision.闪电战男爵于1977年作为神奇女侠和超人的对手首次登场。目前尚不清楚他是否将以特殊能力者的身份出现在《绿箭侠》，他在漫画书中是一位拥有飞行能力，超人力量和热视力的前纳粹士兵。

The powers were given to him while being experimented on by German scientists during World War II.这些能力在第二次世界大战期间德国科学家对他实验时得到的。

Blitzkrieg is also the leader of the crime organization Shadowspire, which works with Vandal Savage’s group known as Symbolix. With Savage serving as the main villain of the upcoming“Legends of Tomorrow” introducing Blitzkrieg offers an opportunity bring him into the fold as well.闪电战男爵还是犯罪组织Shadowspire的领导者，与原始人范达尔·萨维智的集团一起组成了Symbolix。随着萨维智将作为即将上映的《明日传奇》中的主要反派，这也为介绍闪电战男爵提供了机会，将他一并带入其中。
